details: No controllers in this feature - PwaService is a utility class only. Layout uses Blade echo for service output, not return view().
Offline page uses semantic color tokens matching the design system. Dark mode via prefers-color-scheme and data-theme attribute. Lucide icons via inline SVG at correct sizes.
Translation strings added for PWA offline content. No hardcoded strings. PwaService has proper PHPDoc and return types.
laravel-simplifier not invoked - feature has no controllers, minimal PHP (one service class). Scope too small to warrant simplification pass.
